Integrated Marketing Communications

The Integrated Marketing Communications Degree (IMC) was founded at Medill.

IMC started at Medill, and here, you’ll learn to create innovative marketing communications strategies and solve business problems by working collaboratively with both global companies and your peers. Our three graduate programs and one undergraduate certificate will teach you the IMC “way of thinking” that balances qualitative and quantitative components. Medill IMC will help set you apart from others in the industry.

Apply Now Request Information

Our Programs

IMC Full-Time Master's Program
Evanston Campus

The full-time IMC program is tailored to launch your career in the marketing field with an intensive, five-quarter program that prepares you to solve the marketing problems of the digital age.

Visit Program Page
IMC Part-Time Master's Program
Downtown, Chicago Campus

The IMC part-time program serves working professionals living in or around Chicago and allows them to advance their careers by tapping into the deep expertise of our faculty. Students gain access to a network of other high-caliber marketing professionals in the Chicago area.

Visit Program Page
IMC Online Master's Program
Online

The full-time IMC program is tailored to launch your career in the marketing field with an intensive, five-quarter program that prepares you to solve the marketing problems of the digital age.

Visit Program Page
Compare Programs

IMC Programs at a Glance

IMC Full-Time Master’s Program

  • Evanston campus
  • Five, 10-week quarters
  • 15 courses
  • One summer immersion quarter with top companies
  • Five specializations
  • Opportunity to enroll in Media Management at Kellog School of Management
  • Opportunities for international study
Learn More About Full-Time

IMC Part-Time Master’s Program

  • Downtown Chicago campus
  • Two years (evening classes once a week)
  • 15 courses
  • Five specializations
  • Opportunities for international study
Learn More About Part-Time

IMC Online Master’s Program

  • Online
  • Complete at your own pace
  • 13 Courses
  • Five specializations
  • Same faculty as full-time and part-time programs
Learn More About Online
IMC Undergraduate Certificate

The five-course certificate program features core courses in consumer insight, research and IMC strategy as well as a variety of electives that enable Northwestern undergraduates to enhance their majors with a specialization in IMC.

Visit Program
Online Open Courses (MOOCs)

Northwestern has partnered with the online learning platform Coursera to provide universal access to short courses in areas our faculty teach and research.

Learn More
We are Medill IMC
Firstname Lastname @TwitterHandle
@MedillScool's IMC program is part of my professional DNA - I've used what I learned in every job since graduation! #Thanksmedill

Only Medill IMC

IMC students develop a deep understanding of consumers and build communications strategies based on qualitative insights and quantitative analysis. Students participate in many hands-on experiences both in and out of the classroom.
